interviews with servicemen speaking out against the war (maybe)

2003-10-26

"Bring us home now; we’re dying for oil and corporate greed!"
I can't find much info on the author/interviewer for these interviews, and I'm wondering if they are real. They seem fake in some ways, but in other ways they seem almost too gritty to be fake. I guess they could always be fake, but if they are fabrications then they are pretty amazingly done. So who is this Jay Shaft character? And who are the GI, Sarge, Trooper 1, and USA? Their style does remind me of a "debate" I had with an ex-marine/jet a few weeks ago. I just don't know.
